task.title: Update changelog and README for base-path routing

steps.summary: Requested updates to the changelog and README.
Recorded base-path routing fixes in app changelogs and refreshed README to mention Caddy, BASE_PATH behavior, and updated deployment diagram text.

final_summary: Updated app changelogs with the base-path routing fix and refreshed README to reflect Caddy and BASE_PATH usage, plus the updated routing diagram.
